article.title: Williamson Assigned to Army Acquisition Corps

tags.tag: Office of the Assistant Secretary of the Army (Acquisition

article.text: Maj. Gen. Michael E. Williamson, USA, has been nominated for appointment to the rank of lieutenant general and for assignment as military deputy/director, Army Acquisition Corps, Office of the Assistant Secretary of the Army (Acquisition, Technology and Logistics), Washington, D.C.Â
